ygData.subject: Re: Evil eyes
ygData.msgSnippet: weird, we also are hunting the EE s in the gorge(very boring , i might add) and as far as i know it is possible to be charmed and cast but not by these lil
ygData.messageBody:
weird, we also are hunting the EE's in the gorge(very boring , i might add)
and as far as i know it is possible to be charmed and cast but not by these
lil eyes?? we have been there for over 2 weeks now, have been charmed, and
have never casted while charmed, hmmm, and i am thinking ya did'nt cancle
magic for the charm to stop, it was just short lived, evenerone says to sit
down when charmed, lol, i tried last nite--then i shouted-ummm its kinda
hard to sit down when yer courser won't work, when charmed everything
freezes up for me , except my typing--so i really don't know as my friend
said even the typing is not suposed to work. oh well i wasn't much help but
i just wanted to say that


>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Evil eyes
>Date: Tue, 5 Oct 1999 08:35:53 -0700 (PDT)
>
>I have spent the last two days fighting evil eyes in
>the gorge. However, there are still a couple things
>that puzzle me. I was really hoping someone could
>enlighten me. :)
>
>1) Charm, does cancel magic work on it or not? I have
>tried casting several times with mied results.
>Sometimes it seems to cancel it sometimes it does not.
>All of my party members had only endure magic on, so
>the second dispell should have theoretically worked,
>but sometimes it did not. What gives?
>
>2) When charmed, I thought you could not use your
>skills/spells. This seemed to be the case until late
>last night when a 28th cater was charmed and then
>proceeded to kill me in three casts. I also lost about
>a half a bubble of exp from this PC death. I later
>asked the caster and she said that she was killed me
>by a spell that was memorized in the 6th slot, not the
>8th slot like some peeple think. Her 8th slot was a
>gate.
>
>So, what gives?? I think correct information would
>come in handy in later levels.
>
>Thanks!!!
>
>Eylena 20th circle Priestess of Tunare.
>
>=====
><< text3.html >>


Topaaz / LadyJay - *Power Corrupts and absolute Power corrupts absolutly*
